title: [1.5.2~1.6.4][SSP/SMP][个人汉化][暂停更新]丧尸围城ZombieCraft v3.0 Beta 3.3.1
author: liliangxu
txt_content:
本帖最后由 liliangxu 于 2014-3-3 18:06 编辑 



更新至beta3.3.2(1.6.4)
呃 1.6.4更新的很仓促 有的汉化实在是不明白啥意思有对汉化的纠正或者因汉化产生的bug多多包含 希望支出
大家好 我是AL 今天为大家带来一个MOD的更新版本
ZombieCraft 丧尸围城
（一个类似于使命召唤5当中的僵尸模式的MOD）
这个MOD依赖自己的地图 只有在其地图上才有真正的效果
具体的玩法就跟使命召唤5的僵尸模式一模一样
基本上就是在一个特定的区域打僵尸
然后取得积分换取装备和解锁新的区域
每个路口都有路障 但是僵尸会打破路障冲进来
当然你也可以自己修复路障
本MOD适用于多人联机 增加了一些枪械和一种游戏机制
（SMP我自己没测试。。）
上官网截图：

基本操作
默认按键
`键 主菜单
E键 使用
R键 换子弹
LCtrl键 更换观察的玩家
;键 切换观察的视角
Z键 视角放大
多人模式
1、玩家进入游戏后输入/zc加入僵尸模式
2、打开主菜单点击 编辑模式->载入等级->生成等级->编辑模式->退出 
3、所有玩家准备好后一个玩家进入主菜单点击开始游戏
（或者在大厅操作 具体我没试验过 有问题请回帖或指教）
安装方法
把压缩包内mods、resourcepacks、ZC3Maps、Lobby.schematic覆盖到.minecraft或者服务器文件夹内
更新日志

New in Beta 3.3.2 - Map Makers Update!:（最新更新）

ZombieCraft 3.3.2
-----------------

New
---

- MysteryBox! 
-- Supports custom item list

- First iteration of overall config enhancement, mysterybox and mob spawner now have custom guis for extra options

- Mob Spawner Config
-- Custom entity (really only supports EntityZCImp and EntityZCZombie right now, more coming)
-- initial wave delay option
-- fixed spawn delay
-- random spawn delay
- Activation Conditions (able to use all or any at once)
-- Block Watch (the existing method)
-- Player Proximity
--- Trigger dist
-- Wave
--- Wave Min for Activate
--- Wave Max for Activate

- Map Config button in the edit GUI
-- Custom lighting, supports 'nether', or CSV of 16 floating point numbers, minecraft has 16 light levels, so you can define all 16 brightness values of each level, negatives do weird effects!
-- Custom time lock, supports 'noon, midnight, or specific time 0-24000'
-- Customizations for mob count, health, speed, and move leading

Fixes
-----

- barricade repair not counting first repair (it was actually always 5 points behind)
- sounds:
-- reloading sound via key
-- round start, round end
-- headshot
- zombie health and speed buffs
- visual on tile entity spawners not updating
- creative mode players getting teleported along with survival mode on map generation
- Zombie death particles less intrustive
- Comrade flees on low health again
- Improvement on the session GUI, instructions on how to use it
- Revised SMP teleportation rules to prevent state where non op player is stuck with unplayable ZC

Changes
-------

- Entity AI has been updated to my new generation stuff used in HostileWorlds / Tropicraft, paves way for more entity variation in maps
- Subtle Comrade gun firing animation tweaks
- Barricade collision works cleaner now, no bounce back method for players, zombies also dont go through doors if door noclip is on, players should be able to walk over them too

Map & Gameplay Changes
----------------------

- Nacht:
-- Added functional mysterybox

- Invasion:
-- Increased base zombie speed
-- Increased amount of speed and health gained per wave

- Last Resort:
-- Tweaked spawner timings in initial room for quicker action
-- Added functional mysterybox

- Observation Deck:
-- Added functional mysterybox
-- Redid the area around the mysterybox to promote barricading up
-- Improved balence of upstairs area with powerup

- Verruct:
-- Added functional mysterybox



New in Beta 3.3.1:
Fixes:
- Fixed zombies moving super slow making game unplayable (oops)（修复僵尸超慢移动会引起游戏不可运行的bug）
- Fixed various sounds that were still not playing（修复各种音效不播放的bug）
- Fixed crash in interface manager regarding handleGunBinds（修复关于操作鸟枪的管理界面引起崩溃的bug）

New in Beta 3.3 - New SMP Features!:

Note to map makers: SAVE YOUR WIP MAPS TO SCHEMATIC before updating to this version (if you only have it in a world save), purchase plates in world will lose saved settings, but are safe in schematic form

New:
- Adminless ZC session coordinating! Craft the new ZC session block to do everything required to setup a ZC game in singleplayer or server
-- FAIR WARNING: IF PLAYING ON LEGIT SERVER, PUT INVENTORY IN CHEST BEFORE USING SESSION BLOCK, THERES NO INVENTORY BACKING UP AND ZC GAMES WIPE YOUR INVENTORY
-- First to setup lobby becomes lobby leader (eventually to add vote system for abuse prevention)
-- Others can join the lobby, which it will teleport you immediately
-- Lobby leader can choose and regenerate map as needed (which will also be voteable on in future)
-- Recipe is fire charge in the middle surrounded by iron ignots: 

- Config for all Item and Block IDs (DONT EDIT BLOCK IDS YET THOUGH, EXISTING ZC3MAPS WILL BREAK)
- ZC Maps scanned and saved with this version will be able to work without breaking when different block IDs are used, existing maps will have to be rescanned
- Cleaned up block and tile names

Bugfixes:
- Teleporting back from ZC realm wont drop you from the sky
- Spectate camera doesnt freak out anymore!
- Nuke pickup does a proper kill visual now
- Comrade always shows gun in hand when you give him one now
- Updated reflection to the new persistant srg name way, no more forgetting to update reflection names
-- Gun firing rate (click rate) should be mostly restricted again and feel a little less derpy

Balance differences:
- Raygun projectile 2.6 times faster
- Betties now do 2x damage and don't hurt the player, same range, their hitbox was also resized so placing a bunch together is less of a pain

Notes:
- Looks like old texture packs dont work at all now, so until I update the texture pack to a resource pack you'll have to live with vanilla textures for now.

New in Beta 3.1 - very minor changes:

- Better help messages
- Gun ammo renders in overworld
- Betties work on vanilla entities

- some groundwork for leaderboards and map site repository




下载地址
ZombieCraft v3.0 beta3.1(For 1.5.2 Forge):  http://pan.baidu.com/share/link?shareid=158722604&uk=67260153ZombieCraft v3.0 Beta 3.3(For 1.6.2 Forge 9.10.0.830+): http://pan.baidu.com/share/link?shareid=2335235833&uk=67260153ZombieCraft v3.0 Beta 3.3.1(For 1.6.2 Forge 9.10.0.830+):  http://pan.baidu.com/share/link?shareid=3717784045&uk=67260153ZombieCraft v3.0 Beta 3.3.2(For 1.6.4 Forge884+)http://pan.baidu.com/share/link?shareid=734534522&uk=67260153

本人英语水平和技术有限 难免有汉化不到和汉化错误或者因为汉化产生的BUG 希望大家包涵 并且在下面回帖 我会在第一时间修改、发布
（哦对- -有个物品是charge具体啥功能没试出来。。有知道的告诉我）
（P.s.本MOD除自带地图外还有别的老外做的地图 但是由于作者在BETA阶段 有些地图没有明显标注是否兼容 如果有玩家需要 我会去搬运）

又一天飘过去了=。=
求支持求回复~~~~~{:10_492:}

刚才测试了下，charge的功能是购买以后按ZC_Charge键（默认LCONTRL）可以获得时间短暂的冲刺功能（速度非常快..但是时间很短，这个charge除了速度以外还有没有其他功能暂时不清楚）
